snippet: A federal judge has denied an appeal from a death row inmate who argued that his sentence of death by firing squad is cruel and unusual punishment.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge has denied an appeal from a death row inmate who argued that his sentence of death by firing squad is cruel and unusual punishment.

headline.print_headline: Utah: Judge Denies Appeal Challenging Firing Squad Execution
headline.main: Utah: Judge Denies Appeal Challenging Firing Squad Execution
